sense.def:
To observes someone or something
pomeni pozorno gledati neko osebo ali stvar.

seg.quote: By observing your boss's moods, you will soon discover when to talk and when to keep quiet.

sense.def:
To observe someone or something
pomeni tudi videti ali opaziti neko osebo ali stvar;

seg.quote: They observed a key in the bedroom door.
‘People aren't interested in spiritual things,’ observed the actress.

sense.def:
To observe a law or custom
pomeni ravnati se po zakonu ali običaju.
